titles.title: I Keep Falling In Love With Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I keep falling in love with Him over and over
And over and over again,
I keep falling in love with Him over and over
And over and over again,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He gets sweeter and sweeter as the days go by,
Oh what a love between my Lord and I,
I keep falling in love with Him over and over
And over and over again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, it gets sweeter as the days go by,
It gets sweeter as the moments fly,
His love is richer, deeper, fuller, sweeter,
Sweeter, sweeter, sweeter as the days go by.
